title: Sexcapades: Pia and the Prisoner of War
description: There's more than one kind of torture. Sergeant Major Sofia Pia Martinez’s men caught covert special ops agent Jake Callaghan spying on her country’s very secret operation on the San Pablo coast. Whatever should she do with him?  There’s more than one way to extract intel from a prisoner and the Sergeant Major will do anything to get the information she needs from her very sexy captive.  About the Sexcapades is a series of uninhibited sexual escapades from your favorite best selling romance authors. www.sexcapades-stories.com
author: Betty Paper
